TABLE.NAME: amos_repository
TABLE.COMMENT: All Moodle strings and their history

FIELD.NAME: commitid
FIELD.COMMENT: The commit thatt introduced this change

FIELD.NAME: branch
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the branch this string is valid for

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the language this string belongs to. Like en, cs or es

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the component this string belongs to. Like moodle or workshopform_accumulative

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The effective timestamp of the change

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the string deleted? If not, it will be generated into the lang packs

INDEX.NAME: ix_snapshot
INDEX.COMMENT: Optimised for getting a snapshot of all current strings in one component

INDEX.NAME: ix_lang
INDEX.COMMENT: For getting a list of all known components. In some cases, we need to filter English records only

INDEX.NAME: ix_timemodified
INDEX.COMMENT: This index allows to search for the recent records in the log output

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: The source of this string - git, email etc.

FIELD.NAME: commithash
FIELD.COMMENT: The git commit hash that introduced this string

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: If the author is known in the local user table, store their id here

FIELD.NAME: userinfo
FIELD.COMMENT: Helps to identify the author of the change, for example a name from CVS commit

TABLE.NAME: amos_translators
TABLE.COMMENT: Gives the user the right to commit into a given language

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the translator's user account

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The language code that the translator is allowed to translate, or asterisk for all languages.
